name: tree-view-autoadjust
description: Automatically adjusts the tree view's width

minimumWidth.description: Minimum tree-view width. Put `0` if you do not want min limit.

maximumWidth.description: Maximum tree-view width. Put `0` if you do not want max limit.

padding.description: Add padding to the right side of the tree-view.

animationMilliseconds.description: Number of milliseconds to elapse during animations. Smaller means faster.

delayMilliseconds.description: Number of milliseconds to wait before animations. Smaller means faster.
